search_query: Storybook Love Willy DeVille The Princess Bride

best_match.title: Mark Knopfler & Willy DeVille - Storybook Love (Official Video)

match_score.reasoning: Candidate 1 is the definitive best match for the soundtrack 'Storybook Love' from 'The Princess Bride'. It is explicitly labeled as an 'Official Video' and uploaded by Mark Knopfler's official channel, who was involved in the song's production and arrangement for the film. The description provides comprehensive and accurate context, stating it's from 'The Princess Bride' soundtrack, that Mark produced and arranged it, and that Willy DeVille wrote and performed it. This aligns perfectly with all provided soundtrack metadata. Furthermore, its significantly higher view and like counts compared to other candidates indicate it is the widely recognized and canonical version.
key_factors: Explicitly an 'Official Video' from an involved artist's channel (Mark Knopfler).
Description clearly links the song to 'The Princess Bride' film and soundtrack.
Accurately identifies Willy DeVille as the performer and writer, and Mark Knopfler's role.
High popularity (views and likes) suggests it is the authoritative version.
